Certainly! Here are a few romantic movies that you might enjoy:

  * The Notebook (1994) - A classic love story between two young lovers from different social classes.
  * Pride & Prejudice (2005) - Another classic love story adapted from Jane Austen's novel.
  * Titanic (1997) - A romantic movie based on the true story of a wealthy passenger and his ill-fated love interest.
  * La La Land (2016) - A musical romantic comedy movie directed by Damien Chazelle.

I hope that these recommendations will help you find the perfect romantic movie!
